original_text: He who has prepared us for this very thing is God, who has given us the Spirit as a guarantee.
korean_text: 곧 이것을 우리에게 이루게 하시고 보증으로 성령을 우리에게 주신 이는 하나님이시니라

sentences.original_text: He who has prepared us for this very thing
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것을 우리를 위해 준비하신 분은

sentences.original_text: who has given us the Spirit
